title: Looking for Sam Crawford with these backs....
author: Golfcollector

posts.post_title: Looking for Sam Crawford with these backs....
posts.post_content:
I am currently looking for Good to Very good examples of the following Sam Crawford Cards- graded specimens preferred, but will consider raw as well.

Batting - American Beauty Back

Throwing

Old Mill
Piedmont 150
Sovereign 350
Sweet Cap 350 back

Please PM me with what you might have and price.

Happy Holidays and Collecting!

Dave
